OCD.name: Mongo Tracker Store
OCD.description: Persists Tracker Desktop and iRouter livestock information to a MongoDB enterprise store.

AD.name: Wiring group name
AD.description: Name of the group of iRouter components that will be wired together. (If no iRouter functionality is required this value is ignored.)

AD.name: Consumable scopes
AD.description: Comma delimited list of scope names for consumed animal, measurement, and position products. (If no iRouter functionality is required this value is ignored.)

AD.name: MongoDB Connection URI
AD.description: Universal Resource Identifier(URI) of the MongoDB service.

AD.name: Premises URI
AD.description: Universal Resource Identifier(URI) of the Tracker Premises. This value is used to insure saving of information is done only by users authorized by the Tracker Store administrator.

AD.name: Type
AD.description: The default type of animal to add as a new animal, for any information where there is not already a prexisting animal.

AD.name: Component container label
AD.description: Name to label the node in the iRouter Monitor View graphics.
